description:
A massively bright and long-running light for epic night missions. The staggeringly bright output lights up whatever trail or road you aim it down. Despite huge power, don't expect it to take up much space. The rubber strap mount is grippy, secure and compact, and attaches to any helmet or handlebar. Tackling endurance races? The dedicated race mode cycles between boost and medium modes, so you don't have to cycle between every setting. Plus, the compact yet powerful 6 cell external battery provides up to 10 hours of running time at 550 lumens.

  • 4 modes: high (2500 lumens), medium (1250 lumens), low (625 lumens) and pulse (550)
  • 4 LEDs array with a custom reflector provides a perfect mix of focussed and flood lighting
  • Compatible with GoPro mounts
  • Daytime pulse mode for excellent visibility
  • Race mode conserves battery power by utilizing just high (2500 lumens) and medium (1250 lumens) modes
  • Tool-less mounting system makes mounting easy
  • Rubber strap mounts to any size or shape handlebar
  • Fully waterproof
  • External 6 cell battery is compact and features a 127cm cable
  • Battery life ranges from 2.5-10 hours
name: Light  & Motion Seca 2500 Enduro Front Light
